content.rendered:
As seen on The Pink Bride and Zola, Tinsel and Derek's romantic glam wedding day at The Bridge Building was complete with lush florals and gold touches.

The day began with a sweet ceremony on the rooftop followed by cocktail hour on the riverfront and dinner downstairs. As guests mixed and mingled outside, they enjoyed light bites like prosciutto wrapped shrimp, mini pulled pork biscuits, and chicken and waffles.

The industrial feel of The Bridge Building's Cumberland space was completely transformed with ethereal draping and crystal chandeliers. Romantic arrangements by Forget Me Not Designs with touches of gold sat atop each table and sprigs of lavender were placed at each setting.

After dinner, guests made their way back upstairs for dancing on the rooftop and indulged in a variety of desserts in addition to their two-tiered cake from Dulce Desserts. Cake pops and tartlets were just a few of the other sweet treats up for grabs.

For parting gifts, guests were given miniature bottles of hot sauce to thank them for "spicing up" Tinsel and Derek's wedding day.

Congratulations to these two! Keep scrolling for some romantic glam wedding inspiration.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: October 17, 2015
Bride & Groom: Tinsel and Derek
Location: The Bridge Building
Colors: Pink & Gold
Photographer: Nashville Photography Group
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Cake: Dulce Desserts
Rentals: Liberty Party Rental
Entertainment: Blue Tone Music
Production: Nashville Lighting & Production
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Draping: Nashville Audio Visual
Planning: Lesa | IH

excerpt.rendered: A romantic wedding ceremony and reception at The Bridge Building with glamorous details.
